messages.title: Plaid Cymru. For a Better Wales
messages.content: This is a Welsh election - a chance to vote to decide the future direction of our country. In this election, Plaid Cymru is presenting a set of ideas which can build the foundations for a more prosperous Wales.

messages.title: Plaid Cymru. Dros Gymru Well
messages.content: Etholiad Cymru yw hwn - cyfle i bleidleisio er mwyn penderfynu ar gyfeiriad ein gwlad yn y dyfodol. Yn yr etholiad hwn, mae Plaid Cymru yn cyflwyno casgliad o syniadau a all adeiladu sylfaenau fwy ffyniannus.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Addressing the economic downturn with a focus on secure, sustainable jobs that deliver local services, improve infrastructure and equip people with skills needed for the future.

mentions.candidate: Leanne Wood and Chris Franks are seeking re-election to the regional list for Plaid Cymru.

issues.economy: The economic downturn and cuts to the public sector mean that we can expect tough times ahead. Cuts to jobs and wages will continue as the cost of living goes up.

politicalExperience.role: Members of the Plaid Cymru Assembly team
politicalExperience.achievements: Both Leanne Wood and Chris Franks have been valuable members of the Plaid Cymru Assembly team over the last four years, ensuring strong scrutiny of the government and other public bodies.

images.caption: Leanne Wood and Chris Franks pictured walking together.
